_meta.source: Researched from Cayman Islands Tourism, CruiseCritic, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers George Town, Seven Mile Beach, Stingray City

label_overrides.starfish-point: Starfish Point (shallow water, red cushion starfish)
label_overrides.pedro-st-james: Pedro St. James (1780 great house - birthplace of democracy)

transit_routes.name: Tender to George Town
transit_routes.note: Ships anchor offshore. Tender boats shuttle to pier. Can have waits.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Seven Mile Beach
transit_routes.note: Public beach access points along the strip.

featured_experiences.name: Stingray City Excursion
featured_experiences.note: One of Caribbean's top experiences. Book in advance.

featured_experiences.name: Seven Mile Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: Actually 5.5 miles. Public access points. Beautiful water.

featured_experiences.name: Shore Diving at Eden Rock
featured_experiences.note: Excellent shore diving/snorkeling right in George Town harbor.
